history.title: It all started with a "Like"
history.part1: In the days of Facebook, we met through a ¨Like,¨ on those song statuses people used to post on their walls. Our paths crossed as teenagers, we grew up together, and over the course of these 10 years, we built a beautiful relationship of companionship, friendship, love, and respect. Today, we want to celebrate the love we have for each other with the people who have been, and continue to be, an important part of our lives.
history.part2: And you are one of them.
history.footer: Ready to be part of our celebration?

gift.title: We are excited to celebrate with you
gift.description: Your presence is already a priceless gift. If you would like to send us an additional gift, please help us with our...

modal.title: Thank you for your gift!
modal.note: If you prefer to give us your gift on the day of our wedding, you will find a piggy bank at the entrance of the ceremony.

invite.title: We are counting on you!
invite.description: Get ready to enjoy an unforgettable night full of love, laughter, and dancing!
